title: Nanocrystals in their prime
title_cn: 纳米晶体处于其原始状态

title: Driving change in the battery industry
Our choice from the recent literature
title_cn: 我们从最近的文献中选择

title: A move in the right direction
A phase transition glides into view
Observation of the magnetic flux and three-dimensional structure of skyrmion lattices by electron holography
title_cn: 电子全息术观察天蝎子晶格的磁通量和三维结构
abstract: Skyrmions are nanoscale spin textures that are viewed as promising candidates as information carriers in future spintronic devices. Skyrmions have been observed using neutron scattering and microscopy techniques. Real-space imaging using electrons is a straightforward way to interpret spin configurations by detecting the phase shifts due to electromagnetic fields. Here, we report the first observation by electron holography of the magnetic flux and the three-dimensional spin configuration of a skyrmion lattice in Fe0.5Co0.5Si thin samples. The magnetic flux inside and outside a skyrmion was directly visualized and the handedness of the magnetic flux flow was found to be dependent on the direction of the applied magnetic field. The electron phase shifts φ in the helical and skyrmion phases were determined using samples with a stepped thickness t (from 55 nm to 510 nm), revealing a linear relationship (φ = 0.00173t). The phase measurements were used to estimate the three-dimensional structures of both the helical and skyrmion phases, demonstrating that electron holography is a useful tool for studying complex magnetic structures and for three-dimensional, real-space mapping of magnetic fields.
abstract_cn: Skyrmions是纳米级的自旋纹理，被认为是未来自旋电子设备中作为信息载体的有前途的候选者。使用中子散射和显微镜技术已经观察到了Skyrmion。使用电子进行的真实空间成像是一种通过检测由于电磁场引起的相移来解释自旋结构的直接方法。在这里，我们报告了通过电子全息术对Fe 0.5 Co 0.5 Si薄样品中的磁通量和天体离子晶格的三维自旋构型的首次观察。直接看到天体内部和外部的磁通量，发现磁通量的流动性取决于所施加磁场的方向。电子相移＆＃966;使用阶梯厚度t（从55＆＃160; nm到510＆＃160; nm）的样品确定了螺旋相和Skyrmion相中的σ，揭示了线性关系（＆＃966;＆＃160; =＆＃160; 0.00173t ）。相位测量被用于估计螺旋相和天空相的三维结构，证明电子全息图是研究复杂的磁性结构和进行三维三维空间映射的有用工具。

title: The effect of spin transport on spin lifetime in nanoscale systems
title_cn: 自旋输运对纳米级系统自旋寿命的影响
abstract: Spintronics use the electron spin as a state variable for information processing and storage. This requires manipulation of spin ensembles for data encoding, and spin transport for information transfer. Because of the central importance of lifetime for understanding and controlling spins, mechanisms that determine this lifetime in bulk systems have been extensively studied. However, a clear understanding of few-spin systems remains challenging. Here, we report spatially resolved magnetic resonance studies of electron spin ensembles confined to a ‘spin nanowire’ formed by nitrogen ion implantation in diamond. We measure the spin lifetime of the ensemble—that is, its spin autocorrelation time—by monitoring the statistical fluctuations of its net moment, which is in thermal equilibrium and has no imposed polarization gradient. We find that the lifetime of the ensemble is dominated by spin transport from the ensemble into the adjacent spin reservoir that is provided by the remainder of the nanowire. This is in striking contrast to conventional spin-lattice relaxation measurements of isolated spin ensembles. Electron spin resonance spectroscopy performed on nanoscale spin ensembles by means of a novel spin manipulation protocol corroborates spin transport in strong field gradients. Our experiments, supported by microscopic Monte Carlo modelling, provide a unique insight into the intrinsic dynamics of pure spin currents needed for nanoscale devices that seek to control spins.
abstract_cn: 自旋电子学使用电子自旋作为状态变量进行信息处理和存储。这需要操纵自旋合奏以进行数据编码，并需要自旋传输以进行信息传递。由于生命周期对于理解和控制自旋至关重要，因此对在大容量系统中确定生命周期的机制进行了广泛研究。但是，对很少旋转的系统的清晰理解仍然具有挑战性。在这里，我们报告了局限在＆＃8216;自旋纳米线＆＃8217;的电子自旋集合体的空间分辨磁共振研究。通过氮离子注入钻石形成的。我们通过监控其净矩的统计波动来测量整体的自旋寿命，即自旋自相关时间，该净矩处于热平衡状态且没有施加极化梯度。我们发现，集成体的寿命主要由自集成体的自旋输运到由纳米线其余部分提供的相邻自旋储层中控制。这与孤立的自旋集合体的常规自旋-晶格弛豫测量结果形成鲜明对比。通过新型自旋操作协议对纳米级自旋集合体进行电子自旋共振光谱，证实了强场梯度中的自旋传输。我们的实验在微观蒙特卡洛模型的支持下，对寻求控制自旋的纳米级设备所需的纯自旋电流的内在动力学提供了独特的见识。

title: Photoinduced doping in heterostructures of graphene and boron nitride
title_cn: 石墨烯和氮化硼异质结构中的光致掺杂
abstract: The design of stacks of layered materials in which adjacent layers interact by van der Waals forces has enabled the combination of various two-dimensional crystals with different electrical, optical and mechanical properties as well as the emergence of novel physical phenomena and device functionality. Here, we report photoinduced doping in van der Waals heterostructures consisting of graphene and boron nitride layers. It enables flexible and repeatable writing and erasing of charge doping in graphene with visible light. We demonstrate that this photoinduced doping maintains the high carrier mobility of the graphene/boron nitride heterostructure, thus resembling the modulation doping technique used in semiconductor heterojunctions, and can be used to generate spatially varying doping profiles such as p–n junctions. We show that this photoinduced doping arises from microscopically coupled optical and electrical responses of graphene/boron nitride heterostructures, including optical excitation of defect transitions in boron nitride, electrical transport in graphene, and charge transfer between boron nitride and graphene.
abstract_cn: 层状材料叠层的设计（其中相邻层通过范德华力相互作用）使具有不同电，光学和机械特性的各种二维晶体结合在一起，并出现了新颖的物理现象和器件功能。在这里，我们报道了由石墨烯和氮化硼层组成的范德华异质结构中的光致掺杂。通过可见光，它可以灵活，可重复地写入和擦除石墨烯中的电荷掺杂。我们证明了这种光诱导掺杂保持了石墨烯/氮化硼异质结构的高载流子迁移率，因此类似于半导体异质结中使用的调制掺杂技术，并且可以用于生成空间变化的掺杂分布，例如p＆＃8211; n结。我们表明，这种光诱导掺杂源自石墨烯/氮化硼异质结构的微观耦合光学和电学响应，包括光学激发氮化硼中的缺陷转变，石墨烯中的电输运以及氮化硼和石墨烯之间的电荷转移。

title: Universal computing by DNA origami robots in a living animal
title_cn: DNA折纸机器人在活体动物中进行通用计算
abstract: Biological systems are collections of discrete molecular objects that move around and collide with each other. Cells carry out elaborate processes by precisely controlling these collisions, but developing artificial machines that can interface with and control such interactions remains a significant challenge. DNA is a natural substrate for computing and has been used to implement a diverse set of mathematical problems, logic circuits and robotics. The molecule also interfaces naturally with living systems, and different forms of DNA-based biocomputing have already been demonstrated. Here, we show that DNA origami can be used to fabricate nanoscale robots that are capable of dynamically interacting with each other in a living animal. The interactions generate logical outputs, which are relayed to switch molecular payloads on or off. As a proof of principle, we use the system to create architectures that emulate various logic gates (AND, OR, XOR, NAND, NOT, CNOT and a half adder). Following an ex vivo prototyping phase, we successfully used the DNA origami robots in living cockroaches (Blaberus discoidalis) to control a molecule that targets their cells.
abstract_cn: 生物系统是离散的分子物体的集合，这些物体在周围移动并相互碰撞。细胞通过精确地控制这些碰撞来执行复杂的过程，但是开发可以与这种相互作用进行交互并控制这种相互作用的人造机器仍然是一个巨大的挑战。 DNA是计算的天然底物，已被用于实现各种数学问题，逻辑电路和机器人技术。该分子还可以自然地与生物系统相互作用，并且已经证明了不同形式的基于DNA的生物计算。在这里，我们证明了DNA折纸可用于制造能够在活体动物中彼此动态交互的纳米级机器人。相互作用产生逻辑输出，该逻辑输出被中继以打开或关闭分子有效载荷。作为原理证明，我们使用该系统创建可模拟各种逻辑门（AND，OR，XOR，NAND，NOT，CNOT和半加法器）的体系结构。在离体成型阶段之后，我们成功地在活蟑螂（Blaberus discoidalis）中使用了DNA折纸机器人来控制靶向其细胞的分子。

title: Dynamic relaxation of a levitated nanoparticle from a non-equilibrium steady state
title_cn: 悬浮纳米粒子从非平衡稳态动态弛豫
abstract: Fluctuation theorems are a generalization of thermodynamics on small scales and provide the tools to characterize the fluctuations of thermodynamic quantities in non-equilibrium nanoscale systems. They are particularly important for understanding irreversibility and the second law in fundamental chemical and biological processes that are actively driven, thus operating far from thermal equilibrium. Here, we apply the framework of fluctuation theorems to investigate the important case of a system relaxing from a non-equilibrium state towards equilibrium. Using a vacuum-trapped nanoparticle, we demonstrate experimentally the validity of a fluctuation theorem for the relative entropy change occurring during relaxation from a non-equilibrium steady state. The platform established here allows non-equilibrium fluctuation theorems to be studied experimentally for arbitrary steady states and can be extended to investigate quantum fluctuation theorems as well as systems that do not obey detailed balance.
abstract_cn: 波动定理是对小尺度热力学的概括，并提供了表征非平衡纳米尺度系统热力学量波动的工具。它们对于理解不可逆性和主动驱动的基本化学和生物过程中的第二定律特别重要，因此远离热平衡运行。在这里，我们应用波动定理的框架来研究系统从非平衡状态向平衡松弛的重要情况。使用真空捕获的纳米粒子，我们通过实验证明了波动定理对于从非平衡稳态弛豫期间发生的相对熵变化的有效性。此处建立的平台允许通过实验研究任意稳态的非平衡波动定理，并且可以扩展用于研究量子波动定理以及不遵循详细平衡的系统。</ p>

title: Electronic control of optical Anderson localization modes
title_cn: 光学安德森定位模式的电子控制
abstract: Anderson localization of light has been demonstrated in a few different dielectric materials and lithographically fabricated structures. However, such localization is difficult to control, and requires strong magnetic fields or nonlinear optical effects, and electronic control has not been demonstrated. Here, we show control of optical Anderson localization using charge carriers injected into more than 100 submicrometre-scale p–n diodes. The diodes are embedded into the cross-section of the optical waveguide and are fabricated with a technology compatible with the current electronics industry. Large variations in the output signal, exceeding a factor of 100, were measured with 1 V and a control current of 1 mA. The transverse footprint of our device is only 0.125 µm2, about five orders of magnitude smaller than optical two-dimensional lattices. Whereas all-electronic localization has a narrow usable bandwidth, electronically controlled optical localization can access more than a gigahertz of bandwidth and creates new possibilities for controlling localization at radiofrequencies, which can benefit applications such as random lasers, optical limiters, imagers, quantum optics and measurement devices.
abstract_cn: 在几种不同的介电材料和光刻制造的结构中，已经证明了安德森光的局部化。然而，这种定位难以控制，并且需要强磁场或非线性光学效应，并且尚未证明电子控制。在这里，我们展示了使用注入到100多个亚微米级p＆＃8211; n二极管中的电荷载流子来控制光学安德森定位的过程。二极管嵌入光波导的横截面中，并采用与当前电子行业兼容的技术制造。在1V的控制电流和1mA的控制电流下，测量到输出信号的大变化超过100倍。我们的设备的横向尺寸仅为0.125＆＃181; m <sup> 2 </ sup>，大约比光学二维晶格小五个数量级。全电子定位的可用带宽很窄，而电子控制的光学定位可以访问超过千兆赫的带宽，并为控制无线电频率创造了新的可能性，这可以使诸如随机激光器，光学限制器，成像器，量子光学和测量设备。</ p>

title: Black phosphorus field-effect transistors
abstract: Two-dimensional crystals have emerged as a class of materials that may impact future electronic technologies. Experimentally identifying and characterizing new functional two-dimensional materials is challenging, but also potentially rewarding. Here, we fabricate field-effect transistors based on few-layer black phosphorus crystals with thickness down to a few nanometres. Reliable transistor performance is achieved at room temperature in samples thinner than 7.5 nm, with drain current modulation on the order of 105 and well-developed current saturation in the I–V characteristics. The charge-carrier mobility is found to be thickness-dependent, with the highest values up to ∼1,000 cm2 V−1 s−1 obtained for a thickness of ∼10 nm. Our results demonstrate the potential of black phosphorus thin crystals as a new two-dimensional material for applications in nanoelectronic devices.
abstract_cn: 二维晶体已经作为一类材料出现，可能会影响未来的电子技术。 实验上识别和表征新的功能性二维材料具有挑战性，但也可能会有所收获。 在这里，我们制造了基于几层黑磷晶体的场效应晶体管，其厚度低至几纳米。 在室温下，对厚度小于7.5nm的样品实现了可靠的晶体管性能，其漏极电流调制为10 5 ，并且I＆＃8211; V特性充分发展 。 发现电荷载流子迁移率与厚度有关，最大值高达＆＃8764; 1,000 cm 2 ＆＃160; V ＆＃8722; 1 获得的厚度为＆＃8764; 10 nm的＆＃160; s ＆＃8722; 1 。 我们的结果证明了黑磷薄晶体作为纳米电子器件中新的二维材料的潜力。

title: Generating electricity by moving a droplet of ionic liquid along graphene
title_cn: 通过沿石墨烯移动一滴离子液体来发电
abstract: Since the early nineteenth century, it has been known that an electric potential can be generated by driving an ionic liquid through fine channels or holes under a pressure gradient. More recently, it has been reported that carbon nanotubes can generate a voltage when immersed in flowing liquids, but the exact origin of these observations is unclear, and generating electricity without a pressure gradient remains a challenge. Here, we show that a voltage of a few millivolts can be produced by moving a droplet of sea water or ionic solution over a strip of monolayer graphene under ambient conditions. Through experiments and density functional theory calculations, we find that a pseudocapacitor is formed at the droplet/graphene interface, which is driven forward by the moving droplet, charging and discharging at the front and rear of the droplet. This gives rise to an electric potential that is proportional to the velocity and number of droplets. The potential is also found to be dependent on the concentration and ionic species of the droplet, and decreases sharply with an increasing number of graphene layers. We illustrate the potential of this electrokinetic phenomenon by using it to create a handwriting sensor and an energy-harvesting device.
abstract_cn: 自19世纪初以来，已知可以通过在压力梯度下驱动离子液体通过细小的通道或孔来产生电势。最近，据报道，碳纳米管浸入流动的液体中时可以产生电压，但是这些观察的确切来源尚不清楚，并且在没有压力梯度的情况下发电仍然是一个挑战。在这里，我们表明，在环境条件下，通过将海水或离子溶液的液滴移过单层石墨烯条带，可以产生几毫伏的电压。通过实验和密度泛函理论计算，我们发现在液滴/石墨烯界面处形成了伪电容器，该伪电容器由移动的液滴向前驱动，在液滴的前后进行充电和放电。这产生与液滴的速度和数量成比例的电势。还发现电势取决于液滴的浓度和离子种类，并且随着石墨烯层数量的增加而急剧下降。通过使用它创建手写传感器和能量收集设备，我们说明了这种电动现象的潜力。

title: High thermal conductivity of chain-oriented amorphous polythiophene
title_cn: 链取向非晶聚噻吩的高导热性
abstract: Polymers are usually considered thermal insulators, because the amorphous arrangement of the molecular chains reduces the mean free path of heat-conducting phonons. The most common method to increase thermal conductivity is to draw polymeric fibres, which increases chain alignment and crystallinity, but creates a material that currently has limited thermal applications. Here we show that pure polythiophene nanofibres can have a thermal conductivity up to ∼4.4 W m–1 K–1 (more than 20 times higher than the bulk polymer value) while remaining amorphous. This enhancement results from significant molecular chain orientation along the fibre axis that is obtained during electropolymerization using nanoscale templates. Thermal conductivity data suggest that, unlike in drawn crystalline fibres, in our fibres the dominant phonon-scattering process at room temperature is still related to structural disorder. Using vertically aligned arrays of nanofibres, we demonstrate effective heat transfer at critical contacts in electronic devices operating under high-power conditions at 200 °C over numerous cycles.
abstract_cn: 聚合物通常被认为是绝热体，因为分子链的无定形排列降低了导热声子的平均自由程。增加导热率的最常见方法是拉伸聚合物纤维，这会增加链的排列和结晶度，但会产生目前热应用受限的材料。在这里，我们显示纯聚噻吩纳米纤维的导热系数可高达＆＃8764; 4.4 W m <sup>＆＃8211; 1 </ sup>＆＃160; K <sup>＆＃8211; 1 </ sup> （比本体聚合物值高20倍以上），同时保持无定形状态。这种增强来自使用纳米级模板在电聚合过程中获得的沿纤维轴的显着分子链取向。导热系数数据表明，与拉伸的结晶纤维不同，在我们的纤维中，室温下主要的声子散射过程仍与结构无序有关。使用垂直排列的纳米纤维阵列，我们证明了在高功率条件下，在200°C的高功率条件下运行的电子设备中的关键触点上有效的传热过程是无数次的。</ p>

title: Atomic mechanism of the semiconducting-to-metallic phase transition in single-layered MoS2
title_cn: 单层MoS2中半导体到金属相变的原子机理
abstract: Phase transitions can be used to alter the properties of a material without adding any additional atoms and are therefore of significant technological value. In a solid, phase transitions involve collective atomic displacements, but such atomic processes have so far only been investigated using macroscopic approaches. Here, we show that in situ scanning transmission electron microscopy can be used to follow the structural transformation between semiconducting (2H) and metallic (1T) phases in single-layered MoS2, with atomic resolution. The 2H/1T phase transition involves gliding atomic planes of sulphur and/or molybdenum and requires an intermediate phase (α-phase) as a precursor. The migration of two kinds of boundaries (β- and γ-boundaries) is also found to be responsible for the growth of the second phase. Furthermore, we show that areas of the 1T phase can be controllably grown in a layer of the 2H phase using an electron beam.
abstract_cn: 相变可用于改变材料的特性而无需添加任何其他原子，因此具有重要的技术价值。 在固态中，相变涉及集体原子位移，但是到目前为止，仅使用宏观方法研究了这种原子过程。 在这里，我们表明原位扫描透射电子显微镜可用于跟踪单层MoS 2 中半导体（2H）和金属（1T）相之间的结构转变，并且具有原子分辨率。 2H / 1T相变涉及硫和/或钼的滑动原子平面，并且需要中间相（＆＃945;相）作为前体。 还发现两种边界（＆＃946;-和＆＃947;-边界）的迁移是第二阶段增长的原因。 此外，我们表明，使用电子束可以在2H相的一层中可控地生长1T相的区域。

title: Multifunctional wearable devices for diagnosis and therapy of movement disorders
title_cn: 诊断和治疗运动障碍的多功能可穿戴设备
abstract: Wearable systems that monitor muscle activity, store data and deliver feedback therapy are the next frontier in personalized medicine and healthcare. However, technical challenges, such as the fabrication of high-performance, energy-efficient sensors and memory modules that are in intimate mechanical contact with soft tissues, in conjunction with controlled delivery of therapeutic agents, limit the wide-scale adoption of such systems. Here, we describe materials, mechanics and designs for multifunctional, wearable-on-the-skin systems that address these challenges via monolithic integration of nanomembranes fabricated with a top-down approach, nanoparticles assembled by bottom-up methods, and stretchable electronics on a tissue-like polymeric substrate. Representative examples of such systems include physiological sensors, non-volatile memory and drug-release actuators. Quantitative analyses of the electronics, mechanics, heat-transfer and drug-diffusion characteristics validate the operation of individual components, thereby enabling system-level multifunctionalities.
abstract_cn: 可监测肌肉活动，存储数据并提供反馈疗法的可穿戴系统是个性化医学和医疗保健的下一个前沿领域。然而，技术挑战，例如制造与软组织紧密机械接触的高性能，高能效传感器和存储模块，以及治疗剂的受控输送，限制了此类系统的广泛采用。在这里，我们描述了多功能，可穿戴式皮肤系统的材料，力学和设计，这些系统通过采用自顶向下方法制造的纳米膜的单片集成，通过自下而上方法组装的纳米颗粒以及可拉伸的电子器件，来应对这些挑战。组织状聚合物基质。这种系统的代表性示例包括生理传感器，非易失性存储器和药物释放致动器。对电子，力学，传热和药物扩散特性的定量分析验证了各个组件的操作，从而实现了系统级的多功能性。
